titleStmt.title: The railer rebuked, in a reply to a paper subscribed Ellis Bradshaw, who calls it The Quakers whitest devil unvailed: but hath discovered a dark devil in himself, as in his paper appears, / replied by him who is called James Nailer.
titleStmt.author: Naylor, James, 1617?-1660.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication supplied and publication date suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
